## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Vulnerability Disclosure

**If you've discovered a security vulnerability in this role, DO NOT open a public issue.**

Instead:
1. Email the maintainer directly (see repository contacts)
2. Use GitHub Security Advisories (if enabled)
3. See [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/agh/ansible-role-openssh_server/blob/main/docs/CONTRIBUTING.md) for security disclosure process
